bioconda.name: meryl
bioconda.summary: meryl is a multi-threaded, multi-process, out-of-core k-mer counter

biocontainers.name: meryl
biocontainers.summary: In- and out-of-core kmer counting and utilities

biotools.summary: Meryl is a tool for counting and working with sets of k-mers that was originally developed for use in the Celera Assembler and has since been migrated and maintained as part of Canu.

bioschemas.name: Meryl
bioschemas.summary: Meryl is a tool for counting and working with sets of k-mers that was originally developed for use in the Celera Assembler and has since been migrated and maintained as part of Canu.

galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Meryl is a tool for counting and working with sets of k-mers that was originally developed for use in the Celera Assembler and has since been migrated and maintained as part of Canu.
